title: Boosters
body: What will Riot do when a booster admits to boosting an account after a rank game? He also provided the name of his main account which I really want to share but naming and shaming is frowned upon. I still play LoL even though all my friends have abandoned me because I enjoy the game and the competitive nature of the game. I'm going to avoid playing ranked now since it seems pointless if someone can just buy an account, pay for a boost or have a friend play his account (still boosting). I guess like so many I'll have to report and move on, which is sad because this truly does ruin the game.

replies.body:
>What will Riot do when a booster admits to boosting an account after a rank game?

Nothing, because they don't really care, fact is if someone has the money to buy a boost, riot don't want to ban them because they have disposable income.
They will ban the original account, but not the booster's main or the actual player getting boosted's future accounts. They treat every incident as an individual. Same with scripting.

They get banned. If you want proof you can check out this thread. 90% winrate after 30 games averaging 18 kills 3 deaths. That was in season 5, no stats for season 6.
